readme:
# Pathfinder package

A package for Atom which adds a comment containing the current files relative path to the head of the document.

![A screenshot of your spankin' package](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/69169/2290250/c35d867a-a017-11e3-86be-cd7c5bf3ff9b.gif)

## How to use
Simply press `ctrl-alt-a` to add the current files relative path to the head of the document.

## Currently supported file extensions
html, haml, md, jade, css, sass, scss, styl, less, c, h, cpp,
java, scala, js, coffee, py, ruby, cson, erb
